column5: Very cool new product for those of us who like their coffee in the bush...  http://www.venturedesignworks.com/pressbot.html  Why didn't I think of that!
Too Cool....  Just e-mailed my wife the link and put "Father's Day" in the subject line.  Hope I wasn't too subtle.   dk
I looked at it I read the blurb about it.....I don't get it I don't see what it does...........
I click on the link and get a blank page?  Maureen

Couple things I would be worried about  The heat from the coffee on a plastic container ~ outch The heat loss from a plastic container ~ burrrrr Cleaning out the coffe grounds Once you use it for coffee anything else you put in there will taste like coffee  Bodems have been around for a long while, to quote a song GOT TOO KEEP THEM SEPARATED
Me too Maureen, me too.  Blank as blank can be!!!!  Tom
I would think you don't have the plug-in java or flash or whatever the plug-in is which will let you display the page
